data.description: Set of tools for eDonkey peer2peer protocol.
data.P2P:: could be a branch for any other peer2peer tools or
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
P2P::pDonkey is the set of tools for manipulating eDonkey peer2peer
    net protocol and other eDonkey network aspects.

    P2P:: could be a branch for any other peer2peer tools or
    applications.

    At the moment P2P::pDonkey includes the following modules:

    P2P::pDonkey::Meta - module for packing/unpacking Meta Data of
    eDonkey packets P2P::pDonkey::Packet - module for packing/unpacking
    eDonkey packets P2P::pDonkey::ServerMet - read/write/print
    server.met file P2P::pDonkey::PartMet - read/write/print *.part.met
    files (perhaps P2P::pDonkey::Met::*?)
